posts.text:
[EU/IS] ScArK-PvPvE [5xALL][Lvl120] - Raid Protect
Þetta er semsagt nýr Ark survival evolved server sem er hýstur í Paris/France og er undir umsjón íslendinga. 
Endilega kíkið á okkur.
PvP | Taming 5x | Harvest 5x | EXPx5. |Player lvl cap 120 | Difficulty 4x | Shorter nights | Raid hours from 12:00(Noon) - 24:00(Midnight) Cest time
Faster Breeding Process
Reglur
Respect the admins 
Griefing and Terrorizing Player, As in killing someone all day long without a reason not allowed. 
Offensive language, Racism, Spamming main chat not allowed. 
Only destroy what needed while raiding a base. 
Killing and raiding low level players not allowed, players under lvl 30 who is new and is not even in a tribe. 
Have Fun!
https://arkservers.net/server/92.222.207.209:27015
Eða smellið á ip tölu til að joina
